articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Russian President
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, Thursday sent a message of greeting to V. V. Putin, president of the Russian Federation. 
					 The message said:
					
					 Please accept my warm greetings to you and your government and people on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					
					 To steadily boost the tradition of the DPRK-Russia friendship forged during the historical days of the great hard-fought anti-Japanese war is in line with the wishes and basic interests of the peoples of the two countries and will contribute to peace and development in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world. 
					
					 Believing that the traditional DPRK-Russia relations of friendship and cooperation that have been carried forward generation after generation will further develop in the future, I wish you success in your responsible work and the friendly Russian people welfare and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Congolese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Congolese President
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Congolese President Denis Sassou-Nguesso on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of the country's independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed his conviction that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Congo would grow stronger in various fields and wished the president and his people success in the work for the stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Russian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Russian FM
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greeting to Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The message expressed conviction that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily develop in the spirit of the DPRK-Russian joint declarations and the interests of the two peoples, wishing him greater success in his work.

articles.title: Guinean President Meets DPRK Government Delegation
articles.content:
Guinean President Meets DPRK Government Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Guinean President Alpha Conde met with the DPRK government delegation headed by DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on a visit to the country at the presidential palace on Wednesday.
					 The president said that preceding leaders of the DPRK and its supreme leader Kim Jong Un extended unreserved support and cooperation to the socio-economic development of Guinea.
					
					 He will steadily develop the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, he added.
					
					 He extended solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts for the peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Talks between DPRK, Guinean FMs Held
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK, Guinean FMs Held
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Talks were held in Conakry on Wednesday between Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun and Minister of State for Foreign Affairs and Overseas Compatriots of Guinea Francois Lonseny Fall.
					 Present there were members of the DPRK government delegation on a visit to Guinea and the DPRK ambassador to the country from the DPRK side and minister of Agriculture, secretary general of the Ministry of Defence, general director for African, Asian and Middle East Affairs of the Ministry of State for Foreign Affairs and Overseas Compatriots and officials concerned from the Guinean side.
					
					 Both sides informed the situation of their countries and exchanged views on the development of the friendly relations between the two countries and other issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Organizations in North, South Release Joint Appeal
articles.content:
Organizations in North, South Release Joint Appeal
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- More than 120 organizations in the north and the south including the north's Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation, the south's "Preparatory Committee for National Joint Events on August 15 Liberation Day" and the Council for the Peaceful Unification of Tangun's Nation on Thursday released a north-south joint appeal for a national joint event marking Aug. 15 Korea's liberation day. 
					 The appeal reads in full:
					
					 August 15 is the 68th anniversary of the liberation of our nation from the oppression of the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 Our nation suffered all sorts of misfortunes and sufferings for more than 40 years after becoming colonial slaves with its country usurped by the Japanese imperialists. The liberation of Korea on Aug. 15, 1945, an exciting event, was achieved thanks to the anti-Japanese fighters for independence who fought against the Japanese imperialists' brutal suppression with arms at the cost of their lives and the united efforts of all Koreans who turned out under the banner of anti-Japanese struggle. But it was not complete liberation of our nation. 
					
					 It was because there continued national division due to outside forces' interference. 
					
					 Korea is still suffering from national division caused by the aggressor outside forces though 68 years have passed since then. 
					
					 It is because of the U.S. and Japan which brought the Korean nation distress and misfortune through the conclusion of the brigandish and secret "Katsura-Taft Treaty". 
					
					 It is nearly seven decades since then but Japan is openly revealing its attempt to grab Tok Islets, part of the inalienable territory of Korea. It is suppressing Koreans in Japan, the descendants of those who were forcibly drafted to Japan, working hard to close national schools. Japan is busy perpetrating intolerable provocations to the Koreans and pressing ahead with moves for reinvasion. 
					
					 The U.S. and Japan which imposed misfortunes and sufferings upon our nation should honestly apologize and reflect on them and make due reparation to our nation. 
					
					 All Koreans in the north, south and abroad will continue to launch dynamic nationwide struggle to force the U.S. and Japan to make an apology and a thousand-fold reparation for the above-said wrongs done to the Korean nation.
					
					 We 70 million Koreans, the descendants of King Tangun, will pool our efforts in the spirit of independence and great national unity to stage a vigorous struggle for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and once again demonstrate before the whole world the will to achieve independent national reunification, recollecting the genuine meaning of Aug. 15, the day of Korea's liberation. 
					
					 We are confident that the nation will greet a new future when the Koreans unite under the banner of "by our nation itself" irrespective of ideology and ism as one nation that created a proud history spanning 5 000 years. 
					
					 The north and the south of Korea issued a joint appeal today, making August 15 an occasion of hardening the will for independent reunification, peace and prosperity common to the nation. 
					
					 August 15 will be a day of holding higher the banner of independent national reunification in the days ahead.
					
					 Let us make August 15 an occasion of flinging open the gate of national reunification!
					
					 Long live national reunification!

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Bring Future in Unity
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Bring Future in Unity
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The All-Korean Committee for Implementation of the June 15 Joint Declaration released an appeal to all the Koreans at home and abroad Thursday, the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 After putting Korea under their occupation for over four decades early in the last century the Japanese imperialists enforced a harsh colonial rule, inflicting untold misfortune, sufferings and sacrifice on the Korean nation, the appeal said, and continued:
					
					 Japan is now busy concealing and distorting history of aggression and crimes, far from making an apology and reparation for the past crimes. It is even openly revealing its attempt to seize Tok Islets.
					
					 The All-Korean Committee appealed as follows to all the Koreans, solemnly declaring its firm will to take the lead in ushering in the new era of peace, reunification and prosperity through the great unity of the nation under the banner of the north-south joint declaration, on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation:
					
					 The north and the south should promote reconciliation and unity and activate cooperation and exchange.
					
					 The Korean nation has the July 4 joint statement which clarifies the basic principles of national reunification and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration which provide a decisive phase for nation's reconciliation and unity in the new century.
					
					 All the Koreans at home and abroad should respect the agreements between the north and the south and actively turn out for their implementation.
					
					 All acts of slandering and antagonizing each other should be refrained so as to end distrust and confrontation between compatriots.
					
					 What our nation wants is reconciliation, unity, peace and prosperity, not confrontation and war.
					
					 The creation of special zone for peace and cooperation in the West Sea is a practical way of removing military tensions and conflicts and paving a wide avenue for peace and prosperity.
					
					 All military exercises and acts of slandering and antagonizing the fellow countrymen should be stopped in relations between the north and the south and everything should be orientated to defusing military tensions and ensuring peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is an important task faced by the Korean nation to force Japan to make apology and reparation for the past crimes it committed against the Korean nation and thwart its moves for militarist revival.
					
					 All the Koreans should unite to resolutely deter Japan from lurching to the right and intensifying its moves for militarist reinvasion.
					
					 A nationwide movement should be waged to wrest apology and reparation from Japan for its past crimes.
					
					 Let us open up the future of peace and prosperity through the great unity of the nation in the same spirit of independence and sovereignty as displayed by the anti-Japanese forerunners.
					
					 The All-Korean Committee will always take the lead in the way of pooling the intentions and minds of all the Koreans for nation's reconciliation, cooperation, exchange and peace and reunification.

articles.title: Message of Greeting from Russian President
articles.content:
Message of Greeting from Russian President
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from V. V. Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on Thursday. 
					 The message said:
					
					 Your Excellency respected Kim Jong Un, please accept my sincere congratulations to you on the occasion of the day of Korea's liberation, national holiday. 
					
					 The relations between Russia and the DPRK have traditionally had the friendly and constructive nature. 
					
					 I believe that to steadily expand the political dialogue and mutually beneficial cooperation in all fields tallies with the fundamental interests of the peoples of the two countries and will contribute to ensuring peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the Northeast Asian region as a whole. 
					
					 I wish you success in good health and all the people of the DPRK happiness and welfare. 
					
					 Please accept my regards.

articles.title: Reply Message from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Reply Message from Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on August 6.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Comrade
					
					 Expressing thanks on behalf of the party, government and people of Cuba for your warm congratulations on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the attacks on Moncada and Carlos Manuel de Cespedes Barracks, I reaffirm my will to steadily boost the fraternal relations between our two countries.

articles.title: Greetings from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, Palestinian president and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on Thursday.
					 The Palestinian president, in his message, said that he deemed it happiness to extend his sincere and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the government and friendly people of the DPRK on behalf of the State of Palestine, its people and on his own behalf, on the anniversary of the liberation of Korea, hoping that the day would come as early as possible when the progress, prosperity and stability desired by the people of the DPRK are realized.
					
					 He reaffirmed that his state would continue to make efforts to develop the good friendly relations between the two countries amid common concern and in the interests of the two peoples. He added that they value the steadfast support extended by Kim Jong Un to the Palestinian people always standing by their side in their struggle to retake freedom and the right to self-determination and create an independent state with east Kuds as its capital, which will be an oasis of security, peace and co-existence.
					
					 Again extending congratulations to Kim Jong Un, the message wished him good health and happiness and the friendly DPRK and its people progress, prosperity and development.

articles.title: Opening Up New Phase of Reconciliation, Unity Called for
articles.content:
Opening Up New Phase of Reconciliation, Unity Called for
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The 7th talks between the authorities of the north and the south for the normalization of the operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone took place in the zone on Wednesday amid the big concern and expectation of all the Koreans.
					 An agreement for the normalization of the zone which was adopted at the talks on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation brought delight to all the Koreans strongly desirous of the improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 The adoption of the agreement is a precious fruition by the unanimous desire and will of all the Koreans to save the zone, a precious treasure common to the nation, from the crisis of closure and make a fresh breakthrough toward the improvement of the relations between the two sides.
					
					 Articles of the agreement reflect the efforts and magnanimous stand of the DPRK and the outstanding resourcefulness and wisdom of the Korean nation to lessen the differences between the north and the south in their stands and views and reach the final goal of normalization of the zone for its development.
					
					 Clearly reflected in the agreement is the wound given to the minds of the Koreans including the sufferings and damage done to south Korean businessmen due to the issue of the zone, the broad understanding of the expectation and desires of Koreans at home and abroad for the peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the region as well as the strong will for the settlement of the issue.
					
					 The whole process of adopting the agreement gave precious experience and taught a lesson that there are no problems insoluble and no obstacles insurmountable in the relations between the north and the south when the desire and interests common to the nation are put above all and everything is subordinated to them.
					
					 The adoption of the agreement has great meaning and significance to the Korean nation greeting the 68th anniversary of the country's liberation.
					
					 The tragedy of national division that followed the joy over the liberation of the country and decades of division imposed by outside force have added to the pain suffered by the Koreans, making it all the more intolerable. So much strong the Korean nation has become in their desire for reconciliation, reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The adoption of the agreement at this time opened up a prospect for defusing though a bit elements of confrontation and distrust produced by history of division and saving the zone symbolic of national reconciliation, cooperation and reunification by the wisdom and efforts of the north and the south. Herein lies the significance of the agreement.
					
					 It is a sacred cause the Korean nation has to achieve by pooling its efforts to remove the tragedy of division imposed by the outsiders.
					
					 The bigger significance of the agreement lies in that it instilled into the minds of all the Koreans the conviction that the north and the south can certainly open up the new phase for reconciliation, cooperation, peace, reunification and prosperity when they set aside differences and solve issues one by one based on commonness out of understanding and broad magnanimity.
					
					 The adoption demonstrated the will and practical ability of the Koreans to creditably carry out their mission and role as the driving force for the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and make active contribution to peace and stable development of the world including the region.
					
					 As shown by the result of the talks, the Korean nation is responsible for settling the issues arising in the north-south relations.
					
					 The north and the south should take active measures to consolidate the achievements made at the talks and further expand and develop work for national reconciliation, unity, reunification and prosperity in the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The peaceful environment, a precondition for improving the north-south relations, can be provided only by the common efforts by the Korean nation responsible for it.
					
					 The north and the south should take a coordinated action against any act of inciting fratricidal confrontation and escalating tensions on the peninsula which go against the desire and wishes of the nation.
					
					 Steadfast is the stand and will of the government and people of the DPRK to defend the desire and interests of the nation.
					
					 We will in the future, too, discharge our mission and duty in the struggle for nation's reconciliation, unity, reunification and prosperity.

articles.title: Russians Place Wreaths before Liberation Tower
articles.content:
Russians Place Wreaths before Liberation Tower
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Russian embassy officials here laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Thursday on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Igor Sagitov, Russian charge d'affaires a.i., and his embassy officials, and other diplomatic envoys and military attaches.
					
					 A wreath was placed before the tower in the name of the Russian embassy.
					
					 They observed a moment's silence to the memory of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army and then went round it.
					
					 They also placed a wreath and bunches of flowers before the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District, Pyongyang.
					
					 Earlier, the embassy officials visited different localities to place bunches of flowers before a liberation tower, statue of the Soviet Army soldier, memorial tower and cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army.
					
					 The consul general and officials of the Russian consulate general in Chongjin placed wreaths before the liberation tower and cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Chongjin on the same day.

articles.title: Masses in Buddhist Temples Pray for Reunification
articles.content:
Masses in Buddhist Temples Pray for Reunification
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Masses of Buddhists in the north and the south praying for national reunification on the occasion of August 15 simultaneously took place in all temples across the DPRK on Thursday morning.
					 Attending them were office-bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea and those of the provincial, city and county committees of the Federation as well as priests and believers of the temples.
					
					 Rituals were followed by speeches and a joint prayer of Buddhists in the north and the south praying for national reunification.
					
					 The speeches and prayer said that the Korean nation which had lived as a homogeneous nation from time immemorial has suffered from national division for nearly 70 years with its peace seriously threatened. 
					
					 They called on the Buddhists in the north and the south to achieve unity in Dharma-minded concord and actively take part in substantial actions to improve the north-south relations and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Flows to Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Flows to Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of service personnel, working people of all social strata and youth and school children have visited the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, in which Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					 They visited the palace on Thursday, the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 They entered the park of the plaza that gives solemn feelings and paid tribute, looking up to the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They looked round with deep emotion the park, which has been built well as a grand flower garden for the perpetuation of the memory of the Generalissimos and as the people's park thanks to the patriotic mind of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Enjoying the view well-matched with the beautiful flower garden in the centre of the plaza and trees of good species, various kinds of flowering trees and green lawns, they look back upon the devoted efforts made by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, being considerate of the desire of the people for holding high the Generalissimos in the place of best scenery in the world, gave careful guidance to the construction of the park, planting himself evergreen turf of a new species.
					
					 The visitors had photos taken with the families and friends in front of the playing fountain site with the stone gate shining with the star of Generalissimo flanked by group sculptures in the center and spent their times in the relaxation places of peculiar round and half-round styles.

articles.title: Men's Premier Soccer Matches of DPRK Championships Start
articles.content:
Men's Premier Soccer Matches of DPRK Championships Start
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Men's premier soccer matches of DPRK Championships started on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 More than 10 men's ace soccer teams in the country are playing in the contest, divided into two groups. Their standings will be decided by their total scores in the two rounds of their group league matches.
					
					 There were first day soccer matches of the first round between the April 25 and Pyongyang teams and between the Hwaebul and Mangyongbong teams at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Thursday.
					
					 The stadium was packed with spectators including service personnel, people, youth and students in the city.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Choe Pu Il, officials of party, armed forces and power organs and those in the fields of sports and education.
					
					 In the matches the April 25 team beat the Pyongyang team 2:0 and Hwaebul team tied the Mangyongbong team 1:1.
					
					 The matches will go on.

articles.title: Respects Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Respects Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, youth, students and other people visited statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Seen before the statues of the Generalissimos on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Placed before them were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions at all levels, enterprises, factories, farms and schools in Pyongyang as well as bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The visitors paid respects, looking up to the statues of the peerlessly great men. They looked back on the undying feats performed by Kim Il Sung, who led the great anti-Japanese war to victory and liberated the country, and by Kim Jong Il, who laid a solid groundwork for the prosperity of Juche Korea.
					
					 Floral baskets in the name of KPA units, institutions and enterprises were laid before the statues of the Generalissimos and their sunny portraits at Kim Il Sung Military University, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, Mansudae Art Studio and other places in Pyongyang.
					
					 People in localities also visited statues and sunny portraits of the Generalissimos in their residential areas to pay respects.

articles.title: New Swimming Pool Appears in Phyongsong
articles.content:
New Swimming Pool Appears in Phyongsong
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The Phyongsong swimming pool began its operation. It was built in less than three months in Yangji-dong area in Phyongsong City, South Phyonan Province.
					 The swimming pool has a jumping pool with 10-meter and 33-meter high slides.
					
					 It also has volleyball and basketball courts as well as sun-bathing place, resting places, dressing rooms, and other cultural and logistic facilities to serve the conveniences of the people.
					
					 There are green areas covering thousands of square meters to add to the view of the pool.
					
					 Designing suited to the topographical conditions was followed by organized guidance to ensure the highest quality of structures to meet modern taste.
					
					 The pool is now crowded with youth, students and other people who visit it for maritime sports activities and relaxation.

articles.title: Skiing Resort Construction Progresses Apace
articles.content:
Skiing Resort Construction Progresses Apace
 Wonsan, August 15 (KCNA) -- The construction of the Skiing Resort on Masik Pass is progressing apace in the DPRK.
					 The soldier builders have completed the walling of dozens of structures including hotels, lodging quarters, resting grounds, underground parking lot, garages and welfare facilities. They are now pushing ahead with the plastering of interior and exterior walls of those buildings.
					
					 They are fulfilling their daily plastering work plan over 300 percent by giving definite priority to the preceding processes and closely following them up with new processes.
					
					 They are dynamically spurring the construction despite such bad whether conditions as untimely downpours and continuous sultriness.
					
					 Thanks to their devoted efforts, the starting point and mid-points of the skiing courses, resting pavilion and resting places at terminals are taking a shape.
					
					 Drivers are increasing the rate of vehicle operations to the maximum.
					
					 They are using a driving method suited to the different topographic and road conditions at high and rough mountain ranges, conducting a campaign to carry more materials, and thus pushing the supply of materials ahead of the project schedule.
					
					 A lot of units and people throughout the country are sending aid materials they prepared with sincerity to the soldier builders to encourage them.

articles.title: Haeju Smeltery Fulfills Yearly Fertilizer Production Plan
articles.content:
Haeju Smeltery Fulfills Yearly Fertilizer Production Plan
 Haeju, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Haeju Smeltery is boosting the production of phosphatic fertilizer.
					 It has over-fulfilled its yearly production at 107.8 percent as of August 13.
					
					 The workers of the phosphatic fertilizer shop have mounted a high-pitched socialist emulation drive for increased production while raising the rate of machinery and equipment operations. They have carried out their daily plan over 120 percent.
					
					 The workers of the mechanic shop has increased the production of necessary accessories and repaired production equipment including mixer and belt conveyer in time, contributing to finishing earlier the monthly plan.
					
					 Officials of the related units made sure that phosphatic fertilizer was supplied to rural areas soon after their production.
					
					 Officials and employees of the smeltery are dynamically conducting a campaign for increased fertilizer production through successful overhaul and maintenance of equipment.

articles.title: Construction of Mirim Riding Club Accelerates in High Speed
articles.content:
Construction of Mirim Riding Club Accelerates in High Speed
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The soldier builders in charge of the construction of the Mirim Riding Club in the suburbs of Pyongyang have made a great progress in the project.
					 This huge project includes the building of a combined modern riding service facilities on the vast area covering hundreds of thousands of square meters.
					
					 The soldier builders with high enthusiasm removed more than 200,000 cubic meters of earth in a short period to create a new artificial mountain. They finished the excavation of ground for the foundation of structures just in a few days.
					
					 By drawing on advanced methods, they have finished the frame assembling and roofing of the indoor riding training ground, riding school and service buildings covering tens of thousands of square meters.
					
					 Those in charge of the construction of the room for preserving historic relics, stables and outdoor watching stand finished the frame assembling of the buildings. They are now making progress in high spirit in roofing work.
					
					 The construction of artificial mountains and ponds, walkways, outdoor basic training ground and other parts of the combined modern riding service facility is also progressing apace.
					
					 The construction of earth road and turf course extending thousands of meters is in the final phase. Progresses are also being made in paving roads and building infrastructure.
					
					 Officials of the ministries and national institutions, people from all walks of life, youth and students are rendering sincere support to the builders, encouraging them to create fresh feats.

articles.title: Construction of Apartment Houses for Scientists in Its Final Phase
articles.content:
Construction of Apartment Houses for Scientists in Its Final Phase
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The construction of apartment houses for scientists is being pushed forward in its final phase under the deep concern of the supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Builders set flat 1 and 2 on the first floor of block No. 17 visited by Kim Jong Un as an example and are pushing forward the project by conducting a socialist emulation drive among units.
					
					 Soldiers of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and builders of Ryugyong Construction Guidance Bureau in charge of the construction of blocks 1, 2, 3 and 5 are taking the lead.
					
					 The project has been done 91 percent and pasting wallpapers, furnishing rooms and other inner work are being pushed forward thanks to the spirit displayed by the builders to devotedly implement the instructions given by the leader and their will to finish the houses before schedule.
					
					 The field commanding headquarters are pressing ahead with the project for the construction of public buildings and service facilities and arrangement of surrounding areas at the same time
					
					 Following the completion of infrastructure network, planting trees, creating turf, greening the areas and paving sidewalks are progressing apace in a three dimensional way.
					
					 Relevant units in charge of supply of materials are providing materials as planned.
					
					 The day for the completion of the project is close at hand thanks to the devoted efforts of the builders.

articles.title: Papers Observe Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
Papers Observe Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Papers Thursday in their articles dedicated to the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation call on all the people to make dynamic efforts for the prosperity of the great country of people, Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea, united close around supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The long period since the national liberation is a history of great struggle and innovation in which the DPRK set an example in the building of genuine socialism where its people have become masters under the great leader and party. It is also a proud history in which the DPRK has translated the cherished desires of the popular masses into a brilliant reality.
					
					 Today's high dignity and honor of the Korean people, all the valuable wealth on this land are a precious fruition of the leadership of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who sowed the seeds of happiness on the land of people and devoted their whole lives to it. In the DPRK the party is wholly responsible for the destiny of the people. Its power organ has also been developed into the one responsible for the people's living as the servant of the people and its army has demonstrated its might as the genuine people's revolutionary forces defending the people's freedom and happiness.
					
					 The sacred history of the great Generalissimos characterized by their idea of believing in the people as in Heaven is now given steady continuity by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is a firm intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to bring about a radical turn in the improvement of people's standard of living in a short period of time, as required by the building of a thriving nation, and thus make the people fully enjoy wealth and prosperity under socialism.
					
					 Now the country is exerting its bigger efforts to raise the people's standard of living under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Un. All the people are making dynamic efforts to increase production in all fields of the national economy, actively accelerating the development of agriculture and light industry, true to Kim Jong Un's new year address. Modern production bases conducive to the people's living have been built in various parts of the country amid a high-pitched drive of construction for the promotion of people's health and their highly civilized life, as evidenced by the building of the children's hospital, dental hospital and apartment houses for scientists, etc.
					
					 Minju Joson says the Korean people will surely achieve a final victory in the building of an economic power as they are led by Kim Jong Un, being blessed with the great Generalissimos.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Redeem Its Past: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Redeem Its Past: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Japan is under obligation as a defeated country to make a sincere apology to the Korean people and redeem its past in view of ethics, morality and international law, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 It cites facts to prove that Japan has taken a wrong road, far from fulfilling its legal, moral and international obligation:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries flock to the Yasukuni Shrine and justify the sexual slavery crime committed by the Imperial Japanese Army and the history of aggression.
					
					 This can not be tolerated as it is a criminal act challenging the conscience of humankind and justice of history. It is quite natural that the world public is becoming vocal, protesting and censuring it.
					
					 However, visit to the Yasukuni Shrine has been formalized, regularized and popularized in Japan. It is as clear as a pikestaff which way the rising generation of Japan will take in the future as it is living in society where history of aggression is embellished and war criminal has become the social trend of times.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are persistently denying the past crimes in a bid to revenge its past defeat by realizing its ambition of overseas invasion and the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" at any cost.
					
					 They are agitating invasion, war and ultra-nationalism while stepping up the militarization of society.
					
					 Japan should face up to the situation and fulfill its legal, moral and international obligation in redeeming its past.
					
					 It should bear in mind that it will meet again a bitter defeat like the one it suffered 68 years ago if it keeps to militarization, far from redeeming the past.

articles.title: S. Korean Social Body Discloses Injustice of Project of Four Rivers
articles.content:
S. Korean Social Body Discloses Injustice of Project of Four Rivers
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean environment movement association on Aug. 12 condemned the misrule by preceding Lee Myung Bak's regime at a meeting under the subject of "Failed project of improving four large rivers, What do we do now”.
					 Present at the meeting were those related to the body, experts and university teachers.
					
					 The speakers said that the project proved unsuccessful, adding that it should not have started.
					
					 They continued:
					
					 This being a hard fact, Lee tricked the people by describing the project of building a great canal as the one of improving the rivers and illegally earmarked a budget for the project to cause losses to the people.
					
					 The regime rejected the possible ecological degradation and damage by submersion claimed by experts to go ahead with the project, they noted, adding that the rivers are turning dirty and no one can predict what will come of it in the future.
					
					 The bad effect caused by the project is all the more deteriorating and the capacity of maintaining it is on a steady decline.
					
					 They underscored the need to make a thorough-going investigation into the companies involved in the project who resorted to briberies and take steps not to repeat such projects.
					
					 They called for bringing the degraded natural ecological environment of the four rivers to normal as early as possible and get prepared to prevent any possible disasters.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Human Rights Abuses Condemned by Pomminryon
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Human Rights Abuses Condemned by Pomminryon
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) released a commentary on August 12 denouncing the puppet government for its human rights abuses.
					 The commentary said that Kim Se Chang, a member of the organizing committee of the south headquarters of Pomminryon, was put into custody in Seoul detention house, adding his illness has taken a serious turn.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The government is pressing for an investigation into him who is suffering from an incurable disease. This has greatly enraged the people. His myelitis with complications has now reached the phase of threatening his life.
					
					 The authorities put into custody pro-reunification and patriotic-minded figures who have made efforts to end the national division and achieve the reunification of the country in the spirit of the July 4 north-south joint statement and the June 15 joint declaration. This is a denial of the joint declaration and an act of escalating confrontation with the nation and standing against reunification. 
					
					 The commentary demanded the authorities set him free at once, describing the detention as an act of murdering him.

articles.title: Movement for Issuing Declarations on Situation Gains Momentum in S. Korea
articles.content:
Movement for Issuing Declarations on Situation Gains Momentum in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A movement for issuing declaration on the situation is mounting in south Korea in demand of the probe into the truth behind the illegal interference of the puppet Intelligence Service (IS) in elections.
					 More than 110 professors of Kyunghee University held a press conference regarding the movement for issuing declaration on the situation at the university on August 12.
					
					 Those who spoke at the conference said struggle against the IS's illegal acts has stretched into several months but Chongwadae and the ruling party are still hindering and hampering the investigation into the case.
					
					 The investigation into the IS's illegal acts should not end just in form, they said, strongly calling for probe into the truth. 
					
					 In the declaration on the situation they demanded a probe into the truth behind the case, punishment of those responsible, reform of the IS and clarification of stand by the chief executive regarding the case and her promise to prevent the recurrence of similar incident.
					
					 After the press conference the professors held a demonstration march on campus, shouting "Probe truth behind IS's interference in election" and "President should promise prevention of recurrence".
					
					 The archdiocese of Catholicism declared that more than 250 believers including those in Andong parish will issue a declaration on the situation on August 14 denouncing the IS's illegal interference in the election.
					
					 This will be the sixth one in the Catholicism following those in Masan, Kwangju, Inchon and Jonju parishes after its start by believers in Pusan parish.

articles.title: Human Rights Abuses of Reunification Activists in S. Korea Blasted
articles.content:
Human Rights Abuses of Reunification Activists in S. Korea Blasted
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The south Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) and the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law" held a press conference in Seoul on August 13 at which they denounced the puppet authorities' worsening human rights abuses.
					 The speakers said the acting chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and a member of its organizational committee who are now in custody are suffering from serious illnesses for which the authorities have not taken any measures of treatment.
					
					 They expressed indignation at the present regime which has thrown into prison those who worked for peace and reunification by invoking the "National Security Law", the worst law in history.
					
					 A press release was read out at the press conference which said the authorities' human rights abuses have gone beyond the tolerance limit.
					
					 Those in custody have devoted themselves to the reunification movement, not abandoning their idea and faith in the face of suppression by the "yusin" dictatorship. They had serious diagnosis from life-threatening illnesses. But the authorities have not accepted the demand for providing treatment to them.
					
					 The press release urged the human rights committee to play its role so that the reunification activists can receive medical treatment at an early date.

articles.title: British Organizations Praise Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
British Organizations Praise Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on August 8 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The statement said:
					
					 August 15 this year is a significant day marking the 68th anniversary of the liberation of Korea from the Japan's military occupation by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung led the great anti-Japanese war to a victory to achieve a historic cause of Korea's liberation with neither state backing nor assistance from a regular army.
					
					 The victory in the anti-Japanese armed struggle was a vivid example of the Songun revolution which proved that counterrevolutionary violence should be countered with revolutionary violence and only organized armed struggle can help defeat the imperialist aggressors and achieve the liberation and the independence of the country.
					
					 Today the DPRK lightens the future of the world revolutionary people as a beacon of the struggle for independence under the outstanding leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and victoriously advances while smashing all the moves of the imperialists to stifle it.

articles.title: Russian Papers Observe War Victory Day of DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Papers Observe War Victory Day of DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Zavtra No. 30 dedicated a whole page to articles including "Red bird of the victory", illustrated with photos of President Kim Il Sung and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, victor" written by Alexandr Prokhanov, its editor-in-chief, said:
					
					 The Korean people won a victory in the fierce war six decades ago.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, leader of the DPRK, defeated the U.S. which was possessed of aircraft carriers, nuclear weapons and strategic bombers.
					
					 The red bird of the victory has flied the air of the DPRK for the past six decades since then.
					
					 The DPRK is a country proudly struggling against the U.S., monster.
					
					 Enemies try to stifle the social system of the DPRK but this country strong in independence continues to win victories.
					
					 The DPRK serves as a beacon of hope for the humankind.
					
					 The paper elaborated on the circumstances of the Fatherland Liberation War and how it was fought in an article titled "People's war" contributed by a Russian writer.
					
					 The July 26th issue of the Chelyabinsk Komsomolskaya Pravda carried an article introducing the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, illustrated with photos of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A paper on July 24 carried an article titled "Korean Peninsula: Six decades in which war and peace alternated" disclosing that the U.S. imperialists provoked the Korean war by instigating the south Korean puppet forces and ceaselessly committed the new war provocation moves against the DPRK after the war.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia con capitalinos partido de futbol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia con capitalinos partido de futbol
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- En visperas del 68o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea, tuvo lugar la vispera en el capitalino Estadio Kim Il Sung un partido de futbol entre el equipo Ryong-aksan, integrado por los mejores jugadores del pais, y el otro Pothonggang.
					Salio al palco de la tribuna el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Disfrutaron tambien el juego Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol, Choe Pu Il, Jo Yon Jun, los miembros del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, los funcionarios directivos de las entidades patrocinadoras por disciplinas, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades de masas, el Consejo de Ministros, ministerios, organos centrales y de rama de deporte, deportistas, trabajadores de diferentes sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares en esta capital.
					
					El partido comenzo con el saque del equipo Pothonggang.
					
					El once Ryong-aksan, que intentaba golear con ataque lateral y pase corto, logro el primer gol a los 33 minutos del primer tiempo con el tiro fuerte a 16 metros del arco ejecutado por el atacante numero 19.
					
					Aprovechando el tiro de penalti a los 36 minutos, el delantero no. 8 de la seleccion Pothonggang envio el balon con peine interior y cerro asi el marcador de la primera mitad con 1:1.
					
					La defensa no. 12 de Ryong-aksan anoto con el cabezazo espectacular el segundo gol para su equipo a los 11 minutos del segundo tiempo.
					
					El partido termino con la victoria de Ryong-aksan por 2:1.
					
					Muy satisfecho por el excelente partido, el Mariscal felicito a los jugadores por el exito de la ocasion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita al presidente ruso por dia de liberacion de Corea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita al presidente ruso por dia de liberacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, envio el dia 15 un mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin. 
					La misiva sigue: 
					
					En ocasion del 68o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea, envio a Vd., al gobierno y pueblo de su pais el saludo cordial.
					
					Profundizar y desarrollar constantemente las tradiciones de amistad Corea-Rusia preparadas en los dias sangrientos de la historica guerra antijaponesa convienen al deseo y a los intereses fundamentales de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises y constituyen una contribucion merecida a la paz y desarrollo del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo. 
					
					Convencido de que en el futuro se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Rusia, que continuan de siglo en siglo y de generacion en generacion, deseo a Vd. exitos en sus labores responsables y al amistoso pueblo ruso el bienestar y prosperidad.

articles.title: Terminada 7a ronda de conversaciones intercoreanas sobre la ZIK
articles.content:
Terminada 7a ronda de conversaciones intercoreanas sobre la ZIK
Kaesong, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en la Zona Industrial de Kaesong (ZIK) la 7a ronda de conversaciones de trabajo entre las autoridades del Norte y el Sur de Corea para normalizar la operacion de la ZIK.
					En la ocasion quedo aprobado el "Acuerdo sobre la normalizacion de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong" que sigue abajo:
					
					Acuerdo sobre la normalizacion de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong
					
					Del dia 6 de julio al 14 de agosto de 2013, el Norte y el Sur sostuvieron en 7 ocasiones las conversaciones de trabajo de las autoridades y acordaron para la normalizacion progresiva de la zona industrial los siguientes puntos:
					
					1. El Norte y el Sur procuraran que no se repita el paro de la ZIK a causa de la restriccion del transito y la retirada de los trabajadores y aseguraran la operacion normal de la zona industrial, sin que fuera influenciada por la situacion en ningun caso, inclusive el transito estable del personal surcoreano, la asistencia normal al trabajo de los trabajadores norcoreanos, la proteccion de los bienes empresariales, etc.
					
					El Norte y el Sur consultaran en el "Comite Conjunto Norte-Sur de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong", que se organizara en lo adelante, los problemas relacionados como la recompensacion de los danos sufridos por las empresas por la suspension de la operacion de la ZIK.
					
					2. El Norte y el Sur garantizaran la seguridad fisica del personal surcoreano que sale y entra en la ZIK, protegeran los bienes invertidos de las empresas y solucionaran el problema de transito, comunicacion y paso de aduana.
					
					① El Norte y el Sur aseguraran el acceso seguro y la estancia en la ZIK del personal surcoreano.
					
					② El Norte y el Sur protegeran las propiedades de las empresas que invierten en la ZIK y prepararan los aparatos institucionales para la solucion de litigios tales como la investigacion conjunta e indemnizacion en los casos de violaciones de la ley.
					
					③ Para solucionar los problemas de transito, comunicacion y paso de aduana, el Norte y el Sur acordaron tomar por ahora unas medidas como aseguramiento de transito permanente, la comunicacion via Internet, el aseguramiento de telefonia celular, la simplificacion de los tramites de paso de aduana, la reduccion del tiempo de paso de la aduana y consultaran los asuntos de trabajo correspondientes en el "Comite Conjunto Norte-Sur de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong".
					
					3. El Norte y el Sur garantizaran a las empresas de la ZIK las condiciones de actividades empresariales de nivel mundial y convertiran la ZIK en una zona con competitividad internacional.
					
					① El Norte y el Sur fomentaran activamente la induccion de las empresas extranjeras.
					
					② El Norte y el Sur desarrollaran al nivel internacional el trabajo, el impuesto, el salario, el seguro y otras gestiones en el interior de la ZIK.
					
					③ El Norte y el Sur tomaran los proyectos necesarios a la conversion de la ZIK en una zona con competitividad internacional, inclusive el reconocimiento de arancel preferencial durante la exportacion de los productos al tercer pais.
					
					④ El Norte y el Sur impulsaran la reunion informativa conjunta sobre la inversion extranjera.
					
					4. El Norte y el Sur organizaran y operaran el "Comite Conjunto Norte-Sur de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong" a fin de ejecutar los susodichos articulos acordados e instauraran subcomites necesarios.
					
					Para ese fin, el Norte y el Sur firmaran lo mas pronto posible el "Acuerdo sobre la organizacion y la operacion del Comite Conjunto Norte-Sur de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong" e iniciaran las actividades de los aparatos correspondientes.
					
					5. El Norte y el Sur se esforzaran activamente por preparar los aparatos institucionales para el acceso y permanencia segura y la proteccion de propiedades invertidas y por que las empresas pongan en orden sus equipos y los vuelva a poner en funcionamiento.
					
					14 de Agosto de 2013
					
					Gracias a la aprobacion del presente acuerdo, se hizo posible complacer con motivo del 68o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria a todos los coreanos que desean la reconciliacion, la cooperacion, la reunificacion y la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas.

articles.title: Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio emite llamamiento a toda la nacion
articles.content:
Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio emite llamamiento a toda la nacion
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 68o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea, el Comite Conjunto Nacional para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hizo publico el dia 15 un llamamiento a toda la nacion coreana dentro y fuera del pais.
					El documento se refiere a que a principios del siglo pasado, el imperialismo japones ocupo ilegalmente el territorio coreano y causo incontables sufrimientos, desgracias y sacrificio a la nacion coreana practicando durante mas de 40 anos la bestial dominacion colonial.
					
					Revela que hasta la fecha, el pais isleno se desespera por encubrir y tergiversar su historia de agresion y sus crimenes del pasado, lejos de pedir perdon y hacer indemnizacion por el respecto, y expone publicamente el intento de usurpar el islote coreano Tok. 
					
					Con motivo del 68o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea, el Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio llama asi a toda la nacion dentro y fuera del pais manifestando una vez mas la firme voluntad de allanar al frente la nueva era de la paz, la reunificacion y la paz del pais con la gran unidad nacional y bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". 
					
					El Norte y el Sur de Corea deben promover la reconciliacion y la unidad y activar la cooperacion y el intercambio. 
					
					La nacion coreana tiene la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, que aclara los principios fundamentales de la reunificacion de la patria, y la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre que abrieron la coyuntura decisiva por la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales en el nuevo siglo. 
					
					Todos los coreanos en el interior y exterior deben respetar los acuerdos logrados entre ambas partes coreanas y levantarse para ejecutarlos. 
					
					Se debe poner fin a las calumnias y los actos hostiles de toda indole que fomentan la desconfianza y la confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Lo que desea la nacion coreana no es la confrontacion ni la guerra, sino la reconciliacion, la unidad, la paz y la prosperidad. 
					
					Crear la zona especial de paz y cooperacion del Mar Oeste es la medida practica para prevenir la tension militar y choques armados y abrir la coyuntura de paz y prosperidad. 
					
					Ambas partes coreanas deben parar los ejercicios militares, las calumnias y los actos hostiles contra la parte connacional y orientar lo todo a aliviar la tension militar y asegurar la paz y la estabilidad en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Cobrar la indemnizacion de Japon por sus crimenes cometidos contra la nacion coreana y frenar el resurgimiento del militarismo del pais isleno son una importante tarea que debe cumplir toda la nacion coreana con las fuerzas unidas. 
					
					Debemos rechazar con la unidad nacional la derechizacion y las maniobras militaristas y de nueva agresion de Japon. 
					
					Hay que librar el movimiento pannacional para recibir el perdon y la indemnizacion de Japon por todos sus crimenes cometidos contra la nacion coreana. 
					
					Forjemos el futuro de paz y prosperidad con la gran unidad nacional basada en el espiritu independiente de los martires antijaponeses. 
					
					El Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio estara siempre al frente en la empresa de unir el proposito y alma de toda la nacion por la reconciliacion, la cooperacion y el intercambio de la nacion, la independencia, la paz y la reunificacion.

articles.title: Publicado llamamiento conjunto con motivo del 15 de agosto
articles.content:
Publicado llamamiento conjunto con motivo del 15 de agosto
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Consejo por la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun de la parte Norte, el "Comite preparatorio de actos conjuntos nacionales por el 15 de agosto, dia de restauracion" y el Consejo por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Nacion de Tangun, del Sur de Corea, y otras mas de 120 entidades publicaron el dia 15 un llamamiento conjunto Norte-Sur del acto conjunto nacional en conmemoracion del 15 de Agosto, dia de liberacion de la patria. 
					Abajo se transmite el texto completo:
					
					Hoy, el 15 de agosto, es el 68o aniversario de la liberacion de la nacion coreana desde la opresion del imperialismo japones. 
					
					La nacion coreana, que perdio el pais ante la agresion del imperialismo japones y se vio obligada a sufrir desgracias y penas de toda indole durante mas de 40 anos siendo esclava colonial, acogio con emocion el 15 de agosto de 1945 la liberacion lograda por los independentistas antijaponeses, que lucharon con armas y a riesgo de la vida contra la represion del imperialismo japones, y por las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion levantada bajo la bandera antijaponesa. Pero, esta no fue la liberacion total de nuestra nacion.
					
					Es que la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras trajo la division nacional.
					
					El sufrimiento a causa de division nacional perdura hasta hoy a los 68 anos desde la liberacion.
					
					EE.UU. y Japon han sido culpables de eso desde que inventaron el tratado "Taft-Katsura".
					
					Sin embargo, aunque transcurrieron casi 70 anos, Japon expone abiertamente el intento de usurpar el islote Tok, nuestra sagrada tierra patria, y reprime a los coreanos residentes en ese pais isla, descendientes de los coreanos reclutados por la fuerza para los trabajos de esclavitud, y cierra las escuelas nacionales coreanas y se dedica a las provocaciones intolerables contra la nacion coreana y las maniobras de reagresion.
					
					EE.UU. y Japon deben pedir disculpas y reflexionar bien e indemnizar debidamente a la nacion coreana.
					
					Todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en Ultramar deben continuar la lucha gigantesca por hacer a EE.UU. y Japon pedir disculpas e indemnizar mil veces mas caro.
					
					Los 70 millones de coreanos, descendientes del Rey Tangun, deben unir todas las fuerzas mostrando el espiritu independiente y el de gran unidad nacional y desplegar una energica lucha por ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. Asi quieren volver a sentir el verdadero significado del 15 de agosto, dia de la liberacion de la patria, y exponer a todo el mundo la voluntad de la independencia y la reunificacion nacional.
					
					Estamos convencidos de que se abrira un nuevo horizonte prometedor para nuestra nacion cuando esta se una bajo la bandera "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" superando el antagonismo de ideas e ideales, como la nacion homogenea que creo su orgullosa historia de 5 mil anos.
					
					Hoy, 15 de agosto, se hizo el dia en que el Norte y el Sur redoblaron la voluntad de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad al publicar el llamamiento conjunto.
					
					En el futuro, el 15 de agosto sera el dia en que enarbola en mas alto la bandera de la reunificacion independiente de la nacion.
					
					En el futuro, el 15 de agosto sera el dia en que levantaremos mas alto la bandera de reunificacion independiente de la nacion.
					
					!Hagamos el 15 de agosto que abra las puertas de la reunificacion!
					
					!Viva la reunificacion de la patria!
